text: NTL is a C++ library for doing number theory. NTL supports arbitrary length integer and arbitrary precision floating point arithmetic, finite fields, vectors, matrices, polynomials, lattice basis reduction and basic linear algebra. NTL is free software released under the GNU Lesser General Public License. The program is distributed under LGPLv2.1. ==References== ==External links== * Official NTL website Category:C++ libraries Category:Free mathematics software Category:2015 software
title: Number Theory Library
